resources.string: Welcome! It appears that your work with the Space Minerals Transport Agency is being disrupted by space pirates. They\'ve set up stations which they\'re using to capture your team\'s cargo! Your new job is to destroy these stations, but that won\'t happen without a fight. Good luck! Scroll down for more information.
Tilt your device to steer your ship.
Tap the screen to fire projectiles.
The area of play is limited. Do not pass walls that look like this.
You reached a checkpoint. If you fail, you will return to the next level.
You did it! Your cargo shouldn\'t have any problems reaching its destination now. Thanks for the good work.
Ouch! I told you it wouldn\'t be easy.
Could not start because levels could not be loaded.
